message:
Hi there

I removed the trackpad assembly/cable on an 820-00850 (2018) to install new battery in this unit. Cable is not damaged in any way, nor the trackpad. after reassembly, there is no click and no cursor. Keyboard is working fine. I tried another trackpad with no success. What might the issue be? I have not removed the logic board.

Try known good trackpad cable.
Also clean the connectors.
Installed brand new trackpad cable after cleaning both connectors. No dice. Time to pull the board I guess.
I think I found the culprit...
C6700 got knocked off. I guess my pry tool went under the board when removing the battery.
